Plintissa had been talking to the repairing Suukie for hours, and even thou=
gh she could only see him from the view of the inside of the CR Chamber....=
but he was talking normal, a bit sad, and not like a lunatic..and he wasn't=
 rhyming......Plintissa had grown to love him.....as he had always been att=
racted to Plintissa, but he was always scared of Plintissa, he remembered P=
lintissa's revenge after he spiked her onto the wall....she blew him to a m=
illion pieces......he remembered all of it, and more so....but he had grown=
 to love Plintissa.....and Plintissa heard Dracona's call and stepped outsi=
de saying that she would be back....she stepped into the room with Dracona =
and fired at Crow Lord......
